title: Be Hyped: Maryland Cycling Classic Launches Women’s Race for 2025, Confirms Return of Men’s Event
content:
Huge boost for US Cycling: Organizers bring back nation's only one-day men’s UCI race with new September date, confirm long-awaited women's race.

Read the full article at Be Hyped: Maryland Cycling Classic Launches Women’s Race for 2025, Confirms Return of Men’s Event on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
